text: “Eghtɨ gumazitam mangɨ uan Israelian tav okemegh a damightɨ, a puram an ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn ikiam, o anemadaghtɨ gumazir igharazim a givezeghtɨ, an an ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn ikɨtɨ, ia gumazir kamaghɨn amizim mɨsueghtɨ an aremegh. Ia kamaghɨn damigh, arazir kurar kam ia uan tongɨn anegɨvagham.
